description: A Research Paper presents original findings based on thorough investigation and analysis. It contributes new insights or results to the field and is backed by rigorous methodology.
A Review Paper critically analyzes and summarizes existing literature in a particular domain. It provides an overview of recent developments and highlights key trends and gaps.
A Case Study explores a real-life issue within a specific context. It aims to identify the challenges, analyze outcomes, and offer lessons or recommendations for similar scenarios.
A Conceptual Paper discusses new ideas or theoretical frameworks. It focuses on proposing novel perspectives or models that can advance academic or practical understanding.
